definition: to start/to put one's hand to/to set about/the seat to the right of the main guest
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
not know where to start
strike first and gain the upper hand (idiom, martial arts term); Making the first move is an advantage.
to act in a supporting role/fig. to play second fiddle
like mice trying to pull a turtle, nowhere to get a hand grip (idiom)/no clue where to start
pinyin: lao3 shu3 la1 gui1 , wu2 cong2 xia4 shou3

sentences.english: Big problem or does not know how to start, or solution is not complete.
sentences.chinese: 大題要麼無從下手，要麼解不全。

sentences.english: But in softball, the pitcher must throw the ball underhanded.
sentences.chinese: 但壘球的投手必須使用下手投球。

sentences.english: The hands of the witnesses must be the first in putting him to death, and then the hands of all the people.
sentences.chinese: 見證人要先下手，然後衆民也下手將他治死。

sentences.english: The hands of the witnesses must be the first in putting him to death, and then the hands of all the people.
sentences.chinese: 見證人要先下手，然後衆民也下手將他治死。

sentences.english: Theyhave federhas air conditionerstuhasly been working on this project since last year.
sentences.chinese: 他們從去年下手一向都在做這個項目。

sentences.english: What is your opinion about David who gave up the chances to kill Saul?
sentences.chinese: 大衛有機會殺害掃羅卻不忍下手，你對此有何看法？

sentences.english: Hotch: The unsubs are watching and waiting for the best target.
sentences.chinese: 不明嫌犯等候最佳的目標，伺機下手。

sentences.english: Aside from Yang Jia, nearly all killers choose to begin by killing the weak.
sentences.chinese: 除了楊佳以外，幾乎所有殺手都挑選了向弱者下手。

sentences.english: I don't mind playing second fiddle in this group.
sentences.chinese: 我不介意在這個組織裏打下手。

sentences.english: In addition, let students know about the previous exams.
sentences.chinese: 學生往往對這門課的複習不知從何下手。

sentences.english: Roderigo. I will do this, if I can bring it to any opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 羅德利哥我願意這樣幹，要是我能夠找到下手的機會。

sentences.english: Stgot-owned enterprises collect out of difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 國有企業下手走上坡路。

sentences.english: As you look around your room or entire house for that matter it seems impossible.
sentences.chinese: 你四下打量你的房間或是整個屋子，看來無從下手。

sentences.english: Just think of what would happen if one nuclear power launched a preemptive on another .
sentences.chinese: 試想一下一個核年夜國先下手爲強會出現什麼情況。

sentences.english: Do you ever feel overwhelmed or have too much to do?
sentences.chinese: 你是否感到不知所措或是工作太多無從下手？

sentences.english: For a sales letter, this means driving your buyer to action.
sentences.chinese: 對於一封推銷函，這意味着驅使買方下手購買。

definition: to set about (a task)/to hit/to punch/to touch
to attack murderously/to strike treacherously
ruthless/fierce/ferocious/determined/to harden (one's heart)/old variant of 很[hen3]
strike first and gain the upper hand (idiom, martial arts term); Making the first move is an advantage.
to dispose of/to spend (money)/to undertake a task
to use violence (against sb)/to strong-arm sb/to manhandle
to make reprisals/to retaliate/revenge/retaliation
to let off/to let slip by/to let sb get away with sth
to observe and make sure/to check
to stop/to pull back
to relent (to spare sb's feelings)/to show mercy or forgiveness/to forbear/lenient
to escape/to flee/to run away
to get rid of
to plunder/to pillage/to forcibly take
deadly blow/vicious attack/treacherous assault
lit. start off leniently (idiom); please do not be too strict with me/Do not judge me too harshly./Look favorably on my humble efforts.
